Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:

The fact that you're able to get these crisp shots when you're really nowhere near what you're trying to film is pretty cool. This is definitely the higher end as far as prices are concerned. So the Mavic 3, which is the basic package, is 2199.
